48-year-old female.context: This is a 48-year-old female with a history of chronic sinusitis as well as nasal polyposis that have been refractory to outpatient medical management.

chronic sinusitis.context: This is a 48-year-old female with a history of chronic sinusitis as well as nasal polyposis that have been refractory to outpatient medical management.

nasal polyposis.context: This is a 48-year-old female with a history of chronic sinusitis as well as nasal polyposis that have been refractory to outpatient medical management.

functional endoscopic sinus surgery.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, bilateral maxillary antrostomy, bilateral total ethmoidectomy, bilateral nasal polypectomy, and right middle turbinate reduction.

bilateral maxillary antrostomy.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, bilateral maxillary antrostomy, bilateral total ethmoidectomy, bilateral nasal polypectomy, and right middle turbinate reduction.

bilateral total ethmoidectomy.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, bilateral maxillary antrostomy, bilateral total ethmoidectomy, bilateral nasal polypectomy, and right middle turbinate reduction.

bilateral nasal polypectomy.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, bilateral maxillary antrostomy, bilateral total ethmoidectomy, bilateral nasal polypectomy, and right middle turbinate reduction.

right middle turbinate reduction.context: Functional endoscopic sinus surgery, bilateral maxillary antrostomy, bilateral total ethmoidectomy, bilateral nasal polypectomy, and right middle turbinate reduction.

gross polypoid disease.context: The initial examination revealed a gross polypoid disease emanating from the sphenoid sinuses as well as off the supreme turbinate.

polypoid disease.context: There was also polypoid disease present within the left middle meatus.

nasopharynx.context: Nasopharynx was visualized with a patent eustachian tube.

patent eustachian tube.context: Nasopharynx was visualized with a patent eustachian tube.

XPS micro debrider.context: The XPS micro debrider was used to take down all the polyps emanating from the inferior surface of the left middle turbinate as well as from the supreme turbinate.

freer elevator.context: The left middle turbinate was localized and then medialized with the use of a freer elevator.

ball-tip probe.context: A ball-tip probe was then used to localize the openings for the natural maxillary ostium.

side-biting forceps.context: Side-biting forceps were used to take down the uncinate process and was further taken down with the use of the microdebrider.

maxillary sinus ostia.context: The maxillary sinus ostia was then suctioned with Olive-tip suction and maxillary wash was performed.

Olive-tip suction.context: The maxillary sinus ostia was then suctioned with Olive-tip suction and maxillary wash was performed.

maxillary wash.context: The maxillary sinus ostia was then suctioned with Olive-tip suction and maxillary wash was performed.

basal lamella.context: The basal lamella was visualized and the posterior ethmoid air cells were then entered with use of the microdebrider as the surgical assistant palpated the patient's eyes for any vibration.

posterior ethmoid air cells.context: The basal lamella was visualized and the posterior ethmoid air cells were then entered with use of the microdebrider as the surgical assistant palpated the patient's eyes for any vibration.

cocaine pledgets.context: Once all polypoid tissue has been removed, the cocaine pledgets were reinserted into the ethmoid air cells for hemostatic purposes.

hemostatic purposes.context: Once all polypoid tissue has been removed, the cocaine pledgets were reinserted into the ethmoid air cells for hemostatic purposes.

grossly hypertrophied turbinate.context: Inspection revealed a grossly hypertrophied turbinate.

hemostat.context: It was felt that this enlarged and polypoid turbinate was contributing the patient's symptoms. Therefore, the turbinate was localized and a hemostat was used to crush the mid portion of the turbinate, which was then resected with use of side-biting scissors as well the Takahashi forceps.

side-biting scissors.context: It was felt that this enlarged and polypoid turbinate was contributing the patient's symptoms. Therefore, the turbinate was localized and a hemostat was used to crush the mid portion of the turbinate, which was then resected with use of side-biting scissors as well the Takahashi forceps.

Takahashi forceps.context: It was felt that this enlarged and polypoid turbinate was contributing the patient's symptoms. Therefore, the turbinate was localized and a hemostat was used to crush the mid portion of the turbinate, which was then resected with use of side-biting scissors as well the Takahashi forceps.

suction cautery.context: Once all bleeding has been controlled, some bleeding that was encountered was controlled with the use of suction cautery in a very conservative manner.

Merocel packing.context: All surgical instruments were removed and Merocel packing was placed in the bilateral nasal cavities with the intent to remove in the recovery room.
